About Me

Hello, I am Jakob Green, an aspiring Front End Developer with a passion for crafting exceptional web experiences. My coding journey began in 10th grade, where I dived into the world of web development through a high school program called ATC. Here, I gained a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and Web Design Principles.


Building on that early experience, I pursued my passion by earning an associate degree in "Information Technology - Web Development Specialist" from Tidewater Community College. The comprehensive coursework exposed me to a diverse range of technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Unix/Linux, and Graphic Design.

Beyond the technical aspects, I thrive on turning ideas into visually appealing user-friendly interfaces. I believe in the power of well-crafted code to bring creativity to life.

Whether it's creating responsive layouts or delving into the intricacies of interactive web applications, I am excited about the endless possibilities that front-end development offers. Let's collaborate and bring innovative digital experiences to the forefront!
